summary.name: Explorers
summary.description: You are taking your first steps into a world of playful intimacy. Light, fun, and simple challenges await you, perfect for breaking the ice together and igniting new sensations!

quests.content: Caress and kiss each other while standing for 2 minutes.
Close your eyes while your partner whispers something exciting to you and caresses your body for 2 minutes.
Write down something that excites you on a note and exchange them at the end of the next turn.
Your partner kisses your whole body for 1 minute.
Your partner writes an exciting word on your body with their fingertips, and you have to guess it.
Caress each other with your eyes closed for 2 minutes.
Sit behind your partner and caress them while kissing their neck for 1 minute.
Communicate one of your fantasies to your partner using only body language.
Bring your faces close together, looking into each other's eyes without kissing, for 2 minutes.
Sit on your partner's back and give them a massage for 2 minutes.
Look online for a new position to try together.
Gently undress the other player down to their underwear.
Cool your hands with cold water and caress your partner's body for 1 minute.
Take turns whispering three fantasies you would like to fulfill.
Your partner chooses your outfit until the end of the game.
Sit behind the other player and masturbate them for 3 minutes while kissing their neck and whispering exciting things.
Try to listen to your partner's heartbeat and masturbate them following its rhythm for 2 minutes.
Sext with each other on your favorite messaging app for 3 minutes.
Sit next to each other and masturbate each other for 2 minutes.
Do a sexy dance for the other player for 1 minute.
Commit to not holding back any sounds or words during sexual acts until the end of the game.
Masturbate each other for 3 minutes, keeping your faces close but without kissing.
Your partner masturbates you until you are close to climax, then stops (edging).
Turn off all lights and make out, caressing each other's naked bodies for 2 minutes.
Masturbate the other player while also masturbating yourself for 3 minutes.
End the game in the way you prefer.
Masturbate the other player until they reach orgasm.
